英文公告.附加說明: 1.If any question about this bid-inviting documents, the bidders can ask explanation according to the section 11, item 7 of the request for proposal before 17:00, September 28, 2011.2.The document will be submitted as an additional remark if the bidders' question documents involved in changing or adding the contents of the original document.The additional remark will be post on the Government E-procurement system before October 20, 2011. Bidders can go to the bid received place to get the additional remark with the original receipt.3.If there are any issue cause our premises stopped work on closing and opening date, then the date will be extended to the work day of the original date.4.Bid received and tender department: No.12 Lane 193, Sec. 2 Chenggung Rd.,Neihu Dist., Taipei City 114, Taiwan.5.Opening department: 3F., No.12 Lane 193, Sec. 2 Chenggung Rd.,Neihu Dist., Taipei City 114, Taiwan.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.15.5.1機關名稱：交通部臺灣區國道高速公路局北區工程處
決標資料.附加說明: 本工作於100年11月9日召開優勝廠商評選會議，經出席委員共同決議：序位第一之台灣世曦工程顧問股份有限公司為第1優勝廠商，並通知於100年11月16日上午9時30分辦理第1次議價，議價結果：台灣世曦工程顧問股份有限公司報價新台幣 14,989,000 元整，超出核定底價，經3次減價後，願以底價承作，經主持人當場宣布決標及底價為新台幣 14,700,000 元整。
